travel_to_everdawn.title: Travel to The Everdawn
travel_to_everdawn.description: Very simmilar to the Everbright portal, this one is found in gatekeer`s houses. Remember: /dimensions

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: A new world with new magic mechanics!

20enemies_everdawn.title: Slay 20 Enemies in The Everdawn
20enemies_everdawn.description: This new place is much more harsh. New possibilities, new enemies. Get acquainted.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Very good! I have heard about some towers around that the inhabitant owns special powers. See if you can find any.

locate_everdawn_blinding_dungeon.title: Find a Blinding Dungeon
locate_everdawn_blinding_dungeon.description: In the Everdawn there is the brother of the Summoner, The Alchemist. Be aware of the dangers of The Everdawn

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Good job! Do you still got the keys from the past day or do you need to get new ones?

loot_4_blinding_keys.title: Find 4 Blinding Dungeon Keys
loot_4_blinding_keys.description: Search in the tower for keys. You need it to open the gate towards The Alchemist

slay_the_alchemist.title: Slay The Alchemist
slay_the_alchemist.description: I hope you came armed. The Alchemist is not as light as his brother.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Astonishing! Check the loot bag, you can get an arc from him that can turn you invisible! Remember, you could get a better one from the enemy

loot_dusk_arc.title: Find a Dusk Arc
loot_dusk_arc.description: Dusk arcs gives you the ability to turn invisible. Very useful when evading enemies.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Very good! Equip it to become one with the shadows! Remember, you could get a better one from the enemy

place_alchemy_table.title: Get an Alchemy Table
place_alchemy_table.description: Summon and slay The Alchemist until you find an Alchemy Table and put it on the ground.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: The table can be used to alterate versions of an item. Try turning redstone into glowstone.

32combatlvl.title: Reach Combat Lvl 32
32combatlvl.description: Fight enemies to raise your combat level to at least 32.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Your combat skills are improving. Keep it up!

get_tier_3_power_up.title: Get Yourself a Stronger Powerup 3
get_tier_3_power_up.description: Powerups are armor trim materials that enhance your gear with various stats. Type /powerups to find out more about it

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Great! Apply those to your armor to become stronger!

locate_everdawn_poison_dungeon.title: Find a Poison Dungeon
locate_everdawn_poison_dungeon.description: In the Everdawn lays the Arachnarch. A gigantic vonomus spider. I suspect he lives underground.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: I strongly belive you need some keys here aswell. However i do not know what kind.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Fantastic. Let`s search around for a place where we could find him.

slay_the_arachnarch.title: Slay The Arachnarch
slay_the_arachnarch.description: I hope you came armed. The Alchemist is not as light as his brother.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Astonishing! Check the loot bag, you can get an arc from it that could prevent the poisoning.

loot_poison_arc.title: Find a Poison Arc
loot_poison_arc.description: Poison Arcs prevent you from being poisoned. Very useful against vonomus enemies

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Very good! Spiders will no longer state an threat. Remember, you could get a better one from the enemy

35combatlvl.title: Reach Combat Lvl 35
35combatlvl.description: Fight enemies to raise your combat level to at least 35.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Your combat skills are improving. Keep it up!

travel_back2_to_overworld.title: Travel back to the Overworld
travel_back2_to_overworld.description: Get back home as we need to find the next adventure. Remember: /dimensions

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Welcome back home, but adventure continues
